official_title: The Use of Penicillin Allergy Clinical Decision Rule to Enable Direct Oral Penicillin Challenge - An International Multicenter Randomized Control Trial - The PALACE Study
inclusion_criteria:
1. Adult patients referred to the outpatient allergy clinic for a penicillin allergy history;
2. Willing and able to give consent.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
